OFFICE OF
The Seal of
NUZVIDUNature:- You are my wife. Due to the love I have for you, I wish to transfer some immovable property in your name free of charge. 2,63,000-00 (literally two I hereby transfer the said immovable property worth Rs. 63,000,000 (Rupees Sixty Three Thousand) to you on this very day with all rights and without any compensation, and I hereby transfer the said immovable property to you on this very day with all rights and you shall be the sole owner of the said immovable property and you shall enjoy the said immovable property along with the water, stone, treasure, deposit and stone along with the said land, water, stone, treasure, deposit and stone, as well as the rights of exchange, sale and donation, as you wish, throughout your generations. I hereby declare that I have not previously transferred any of the said immovable property to you or your heirs or representatives. But my heirs and I shall not be able to make any kind of claim or dispute over any funds. I will avoid all claims and disputes that may have arisen in the past regarding this property due to intellectual property obstacles or for any other reason at my own expense and will be able to implement your use of this property without any interruption. I hereby certify that this property has not been subject to any donation, purchase, mortgage, pledge, guarantee, etc. to anyone and that it is an undisputed property and that I have written this deed in your name. Therefore, from now on, you will be responsible for the fines, taxes, etc. for the Scheduled Property. Payable. The transfer of title deeds is hereby filed for the purpose of registering your name in the Gram Panchayat accounts. This property is not entrusted to the Government.
Kolikapogu AnjiamSheet Endorsement

Schedule: N.T.R. District, Vissannapet Sub-Registry, Vissannapet Mandal, Putrela Grama Panchayat, in the village of Putrela, which was inherited by me as a previous father, in the village R.S. No. 587-8, Sq. G. 169. 4, the immovable property and the house with a mud roof in the said place, my share of the revenue, the assessment, house tax, etc. are being paid in my name, the house in the said place has fallen into a dilapidated state, the said house has been completely removed and I have the complete and undisputed possession, enjoyment and rights of the said house up to this day. Hereby, you are hereby granted the right to acquire and possess the vacant land of the said land in the village of Putrela, measuring 169.4 sq.m. literally one hundred and sixty nine point eight square yards i.e. 141.640 sq.m., bounded by:- East South West: North Cement Road, K. Shobhanam's house, Kolikapogu Srinu's house, Kolikapogu Muthaiya's house, these four boundaries being the median of 169.4 sq.m., the vacant land of the said land, along with all the leasehold rights relating to the said land, and the said land is hereby acquired and possessed by you. I hereby transfer all rights to you. .Sheet Endorsement

sections.content: The property covered under Gift Settlement Deed No 1012 of 2026 dated 29/Jan/2026, executed by Kolikapogu Anjaiah in favour of his Wife, Kolikapogu Lakshmi, towards the property admeasuring an extent of 169.4 Sq. Yds, bearing house number 3-118 dismantled , comprised in survey number 587-8 assessment number 518, situated in Putrela Village and grama Panchayat, Vissinnapeta Mandal, within the District of NTR registered at sub-registrar office Nuzvidu(620) is bounded as follows: North by: House of Kolikapogu Mutthayya South by: House of K. Shobhanam East by: Cement road West by: House of Kolikapogu Srinu
It is noted from the given documents and EC that the schedule property is not part of any active Mortgage or Lease Deed.

Note:: 1. It is to be noted that the online EC has been verified using the key parameters, namely the Document Number, Survey Number/House Number, and Split Survey/House Number of the concerned SRO, as per the Deed. However, cross-verification across multiple SROs has not been carried out due to the AP portal’s requirement of separate passwords for each search parameter, and the OTP-based authentication mechanism makes searches across multiple SROs operationally infeasible.
